articles.title: Secret ink hides full text of The Wonderful Wizard of Oz in a letter
articles.description: Ink laced with molecules that can store data has been used to write a letter containing a hidden, encoded message – the text of the novel The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
articles.content:
By Chris Stokel-Walker
Ink containing encrypted data (left) was used to write this letter (right)

articles.title: JWST has found the oldest galaxy we have ever seen in the universe
articles.description: Discoveries from the James Webb Space Telescope are pouring in, with an analysis of the latest data revealing a galaxy that dates back to just 300 million years after the big bang - the oldest we have ever seen
articles.content:
By Jonathan OCallaghan

NASA GSFC/CIL/Adriana Manrique Gutierrez

articles.title: Hormone replacement therapy may be safe after breast cancer treatment
articles.description: Hormone replacement therapy was thought to increase risk of cancer recurrence after breast cancer treatment, but that may not be the case

articles.title: No link between depression and serotonin, finds major analysis
articles.description: A review of 17 previous studies finds no evidence for a link between depression and low serotonin levels, which SSRI antidepressants focus on – though not everyone is convinced by the findings
articles.content:
By Sarah Wild
Polarised light micrograph of crystals of serotonin, which is a neurotransmitter in the brain
MICHAEL W. DAVIDSON/SCIENCE PHOTO LIBRARY

articles.title: Wasps can grasp abstract concepts such as 'same' and 'different'
articles.description: Paper wasps can be trained to choose between pairs of stimuli that are either alike or different, suggesting the propensity for abstract thought may be more widespread than we thought
articles.content:
By Alex Wilkins
Paper wasps are smarter than they look
marcophotos/Getty Images
Wasps can tell the difference between pairs of stimuli that are the same or different, a task that requires the use … [+2213 chars]

articles.title: Unexploded munitions found at first large US offshore wind farm sites
articles.description: Vineyard Wind and Revolution Wind are set to be some of the first commercial offshore wind farms in the US. However, seven unexploded munitions have just been discovered at the sites, which the developers will have to work around
